quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"brain(大脑)"和"gain(获得)"的字面组合，误判为"智力提升"，或混淆形近词"brain drain"(人才流失)的相反义。
quiz_item.sentence: Many countries offer tax breaks and research grants to attract scientists and engineers, aiming to secure a **brain gain** that drives innovation in key industries.
